Item.name: Material Requisitions Card
Item.description: A card which is needed to request densified material crates in the shop.

Item.name: Restricted Requisitions Card
Item.description: A card which is needed to request restricted material crates in the shop.

Item.name: Exotic Requisitions Card
Item.description: A card which is needed to request alien and special material crates in the shop.

Item.name: Crate of Oxygenite
Item.description: We are not liable for what may or may not happen if you drop this.

Item.name: Crate of Saline
Item.description: Don't let your pet raptor see it.

Item.name: Crate of Chloral Hydrate
Item.description: Does this crate smell like chloroform to you?

Item.name: Crate of Sufforin
Item.description: Inflicts a great deal of Sufforin.
